sentence.text: There are no known drug interactions with LEUSTATIN Injection.
sentence.negationtags: There are <scope> <cue> no </cue> known drug interactions with LEUSTATIN Injection. </scope>

sentence.text: Caution should be exercised if LEUSTATIN Injection is administered before, after, or in conjunction with other drugs known to cause immunosuppression or myelosuppression.
